concept.title: Orchestrate : .Use a Lightning Component to Manage Approvals for a Process Object vOctober-23

conbody.p: Created by William Abernathy, last modified on Dec 08, 2023

Use Conga Orchestrate's ApprovalList Lightning component to manage a process object's related approvals. Using this custom Lightning component, you can manage all related approvals by rejecting or approving them directly on the process object.
MyDomain must be enabled to use custom Lightning components.
